enb_long_title: Twenty-eighth Sessions of the UNFCCC Subsidiary Bodies, Second Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Convention, and fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: Following consultations on Friday, a draft text on possible improvements to the flexible mechanisms was made available Saturday morning.

The document lists possible improvements to the scope, effectiveness and efficiency, accessibility, contribution to sustainable development, capacity to generate co-benefits, and transfer of technology under each of the three mechanisms.
A contact group is convening Monday morning.
